message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $22,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective on the market value, however,  the value of this product to me is quite a bit higher.  I could let it go for $19,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $16,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
